title: They Fit a GPU in This?? - MSI @ Computex 2023
description: Get $5 off your Magic Spoon order with code shortcircuit5 at   Alex stopped by the MSI booth at Computex to see what new monitors, laptops, and pc components they have coming out soon. With some thin and light creator laptops and motherboards with hidden power cables, is the MSI's future looking bright or will Alex be unimpressed with what they have to offer?  Buy a MSI MEG 342C Monitor:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something?
